techmeme.title: DCG founder Barry Silbert announces a subsidiary called Yuma to help build decentralized AI services called "subnets" on the Bittensor blockchain network (Jeff John Roberts/Fortune)
French AI startup H, which raised a $220M seed in May 2024, announces its first product, Runner H, an "agentic" AI model, available in private beta (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Meta unveils new Messenger features, including audio and video voicemail, AI backgrounds for video calls, and hands-free calling and messaging via Siri (Zac Hall/9to5Mac)
Microsoft opens up Xbox Cloud Gaming to existing Xbox game libraries, letting Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers stream 50 supported games they already own (Tom Warren/The Verge)
The Biden admin finalizes $1.5B CHIPS Act incentives for GlobalFoundries, meaning it can start receiving federal funding for facilities in Vermont and New York (Mackenzie Hawkins/Bloomberg)
